question: One of your friends wants to apply for a job involving working with foreign teenagers. Write a letter of recommendation:How long you have known your friendSomething about your friend personalityWhy you think your friend would make a good employee.
text: Hope you are doing well.I am writing this letter to inform you regarding one of my best friends and colleagues,Anna.She has applied for the post of senior software lead in your company last week and I would like to recommend her to your company since I know both of you very well.

I know her for the past 15 years ,Me and Anna studied together during under graduation course after that we started our career together at Infosys as junior developers. She was one of the best programmers at the junior level moreover she is very passionate about her work . She pursued a good number of Microsoft certifications in the latest technology which proves that she is well aware of the latest coding techniques.Anna is a person with good interpersonal skills and she can adapt easily to any environment. I can assure you that she will be a good team player and an inspiring leader to her fellow workers.
Hope my words helped you to get a good picture of my friend and I strongly recommend her to your organisation .Expecting  positive feedback from you after the interview.
